content.body: snek: yeah, seems reasonable in the abstract
content.formatted_body: snek: yeah, seems reasonable in the abstract

content.body: annevk: It looks like the reporter of https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/11782 filed it on Gecko and Chromium but not on WebKit.
content.formatted_body: annevk: It looks like the reporter of https://github.com/whatwg/html/issues/11782 filed it on Gecko and Chromium but not on WebKit.

content.body: hsivonen: presumably those reports will be closed as INVALID so it doesn't matter? Or am I missing something?
content.formatted_body: hsivonen: presumably those reports will be closed as INVALID so it doesn't matter? Or am I missing something?

content.body: Mostly a FYI about trying different venues. I closed the Gecko bug.
(Also doesn't seem like any of that is high priority for the i18n WG, but I suspect Richard at least still cares about it. And Elika prolly too.)
Now that we've made other changes to the HTML parser maybe we should reconsider, but it seems really hard to determine where to draw the line.
